metadata.title: CVE-2020-11087 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In FreeRDP less than or equal to 2.0.0, there is an out-of-bound read inntlm_read_AuthenticateMessage. This has been fixed in 2.1.0.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
